meta.title: Dagin Pet Relocation Agency
meta.description: Reliable Pet Relocation Services in Dubai - Ensure a Smooth Move for Your Furry Friend. Expert pet travel assistance. Contact us for a stress-free pet move to or from UAE today!

header.header_title:
A Warm Welcome 
to Pet Lovers 
Worldwide
header.header_description: Do you need to transport your pet to or from the UAE? Dagin Pets Relocation is pleased to offer you our assistance, including pet transportation services and pet taxis within the UAE.

about.text: We are a licensed company specializing in pet relocation. Our team of experts will assist you in choosing the best route and method for transporting your furry friend.

services.title_ending: offers a wide range of services, including:
services.service1_description: Route planning and coordination, including the most complex destinations, assistance with preparing all required documents, logistics and courier organization, and airport pick-up upon arrival
services.service2_description: 'Door-to-door' delivery options, both by passenger cabin and cargo, at affordable prices. We also offer delivery with a pet courier, providing regular photo and video updates.
services.service3_description: Document verification, advisory support, or document processing without full pet transportation assistance.
services.service4_header: Pet taxi with love and care:
services.service4_description: Treats as per the owner's choice, cat diapers if needed, and special bags for dogs that have embraced the palm trees.

safety.value_title:
We prioritize the health
and well-being of your pets,
safety.value_desciption: and our mission is to ensure the most comfortable and safe transportation for them. don't hesitate to reach out to us today to learn more about our services, receive a free consultation on pet transportation in the uae, or book a pet taxi for your furry friend.

reviews.reviews_description: Our story: delighted reviews on pet transportation

reviews_data.message: Many thanks from our entire family and personally from Caspar David, Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh. In all (not the easiest) situations, Anastasia was there, giving advice and helping in the most critical moments! In the spring, Anastasia and I arranged the departure from Dubai back to Russia, and considering that we had to do it with my 5-year-old son, as he couldn't bear to be separated from Caspi for even a short while üôà, it was a heroic day! Anastasia even treated the child to delicious homemade cheesecakes ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è. But the biggest challenge was upon our return to the UAE a few days ago, from which we are still recovering. Endless stress, over 20 calls and emails a day to Etihad Airways for three days (because there was no response regarding the documents)... A day before the flight, when we were traveling on the train from St. Petersburg to Moscow (almost without connection), we found out that titers were required (which were not needed because the vaccination was administered in the UAE), and it was only with Anastasia's help that we managed to figure out that there was an error in the documents, and our chances were extremely slim!
reviews_data.name: Elena

reviews_data.message: Today, thanks to Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh, our beloved cat safely made it to Sharjah. Anastasia organized everything 'turnkey' and brought our kitty all the way from Khabarovsk.The journey was quite a distance: a flight from Khabarovsk to Moscow (in the cabin) and then Moscow to Dubai (cargo). Anastasia organized everything in the shortest possible time, sent a wonderful pet courier to pick up the cat, arranged an overnight stay in Moscow for her to rest, and then personally went through all the checks in Dubai and brought her straight to our home.The cat handled all these flights calmly, and she is now doing great and getting used to her new home.A huge thank you to Anastasia! Everything was fast, precise, and of high quality. Special thanks for the support, answering my numerous questions, and providing photo updates. In the end, everything went perfectly, and it was not scary at all. Once again, heartfelt thanks and a big recommendation!
reviews_data.name: Alexanda

reviews_data.message: I want to thank Anastasia for the fast and high-quality delivery of our Bombay kitten to Dubai! Anastasia, thank you so much! It was very nice to meet you! Everything was so prompt! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è The buyer is very satisfied! ü•∞
reviews_data.name: Margarita

reviews_data.message: Hello everyone! At 4 in the morning, we welcomed our beloved pet, brought by @AnastasiaBelykh.I express huge thanks from our entire family for reuniting him with us.The cat flew as cargo, is doing well, and is healthy.He's catching up on his naps after the flight.I highly recommend everyone to turn to Anastasia for pet transportation:‚úÖ Pick up and delivery at home‚úÖ Assistance with documents‚úÖ Photo updates‚úÖ She kept me informed at every stage: customs, loading, arrival, etc. ‚úÖ
reviews_data.name: Evgenya

reviews_data.message: Good day, everyone! I want to officially declare that this photo was made possible thanks to Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh))We are among the very anxious owners who fear making mistakes at every turn and having their dog not allowed on the plane. But thanks to Anastasia's patience, attentiveness, and ability to clearly communicate information and plan the timely receipt of all documents, everything went very smoothly üòä. She explained everything, reassured us, and gave us a nudge when needed üòÇ. As a result, transporting our little one went wonderfully, without nerves or breakdowns (except for the flight delay, which unfortunately is not within her control))) Thousand thanks from us and a bunch of recommendations to all our acquaintances üòçü´∂.
reviews_data.name: Anita

reviews_data.message: Today, Dubai welcomed one more Siberian Husky üòÉ. A huge thanks to Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh for organizing the transportation and for being in constant communication with us ü•∞. Thanks to her, our beloved Ichi made it from Moscow to Dubai in cargo and is doing great. Anastasia is a super professional who organized everything extremely efficiently, taking care of all the transportation details. I still can't believe it's all behind us, and our red one has arrived). And yes, as many in the chat have mentioned, we worried more than it was worth it. Our dog is already settling into the new home and showing no signs of stress :)
reviews_data.name: Olga

reviews_data.message: Hello, everyone! I want to thank @AnastasiaBelykh for helping transport our Yorick from Moscow to Abu Dhabi! Everything was super precise, always available, and she definitely knows her stuff! Plus, Anastasia is very pleasant and positive! Thanks to her once again!
reviews_data.name: Tanya

reviews_data.message: A short review and a big thank you to @AnastasiaBelykh. Anastasia helped us with the paperwork for two cats in the airplane cabin and booked a flight to Barcelona. She assisted in securing the flight and answered all our silly questions! The kitties are happy!
reviews_data.name: Dmitriy

faq.faq_description: Everything you wanted to know but couldn't find
faq.more_question_description: We would be happy to assist you.

faq_data.question: What services does your pet relocation company offer?
faq_data.answer: We offer a wide range of services, including route planning, cabin seat reservations, document preparation assistance, logistics organization, pet taxi services, and the option of pet transportation with a dedicated pet courier.

faq_data.question: How do I prepare my pet for relocation?
faq_data.answer: We provide comprehensive guidance on preparing your pet for relocation. This includes health check-ups, vaccinations, and ensuring your pet is crate-trained for safe travel. Our experts will assist you throughout the process.

faq_data.question: What are the travel requirements for international pet relocation?
faq_data.answer: International pet relocation often involves specific entry requirements for each destination country. We stay up-to-date with the latest regulations and will guide you through the necessary vaccinations, microchipping, and paperwork for your pet's smooth journey.

faq_data.question: How far in advance should I book pet relocation services?
faq_data.answer: It's advisable to start planning as early as possible, especially for international relocations. Booking at least 2-3 months in advance allows us to secure the best travel arrangements and ensures compliance with destination country requirements. However, we can accommodate last-minute requests when necessary and possible.

faq_data.question: How can I track my pet's journey during relocation?
faq_data.answer: We provide regular text, photo, and video updates.
